message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be $15000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $14000. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my profit margin while ensuring you receive a fair deal. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties.
